segments.text: Please , where do I catch the plane for New York ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: First you must check in at Counter No . 4 .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's right . Then you will follow the signs to Gate 85 .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you . You ' Ve been very helpful .
segments.speaker: S2
